languages.text: {n}{petname} возвращается спустя пару часов. Его маршрут вам хорошо известен — кибермастиф делает круг по мостику и верхним палубам, осматривая рабочие места. Полузверь-полумашина — живое воплощение преданности идеалам Империума и несгибаемой воли его вернейших слуг, и одно его появление внушает трепет в отлынивающих офицеров, которые живо берутся за работу.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
Если превалирует соулмарка Догматика
Играет по умолчанию
Дать бафф "Пес прошелся по палубам"

Если превалирует соулмарка Догматика
Играет по умолчанию
Дать бафф "Пес прошелся по палубам"

languages.text: {n}{petname} returns after a couple of watch hours. The cyber-mastiff's route is familiar to you by now — you know it has done a circle around the bridge and the upper decks, inspecting the various stations. Half beast, half machine, it is an embodiment of devotion to the ideals of the Imperium and the unbending will of its most faithful servants. The sight of it strikes awe and terror into any idling officers, compelling them to return to their duties as quickly as possible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}は見張りが数回交代する頃に戻ってきた。サイバーマスチフのパトロールのルートは、今ではあなたにとってすっかりおなじみになっている─ブリッジと上層デッキを一周し、各所のステーションを点検してきたのだと分かっている。半ば獣、半ば機械であるそれは、帝国の理想に対する絶対的な忠誠と、最も忠実なる者たちの不屈の精神を象徴している。怠けている士官たちはその姿を目にすると、畏怖と恐怖に打たれ、できる限り素早く持ち場に戻るよう駆り立てられた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} returns after a couple of watch hours. The cyber-mastiff's route is familiar to you by now — you know it has done a circle around the bridge and the upper decks, inspecting the various stations. Half beast, half machine, it is an embodiment of devotion to the ideals of the Imperium and the unbending will of its most faithful servants. The sight of it strikes awe and terror into any idling officers, compelling them to return to their duties as quickly as possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}は見張りが数回交代する頃に戻ってきた。サイバーマスチフのパトロールのルートは、今ではあなたにとってすっかりおなじみになっている─ブリッジと上層デッキを一周し、各所のステーションを点検してきたのだと分かっている。半ば獣、半ば機械であるそれは、帝国の理想に対する絶対的な忠誠と、最も忠実なる者たちの不屈の精神を象徴している。怠けている士官たちはその姿を目にすると、畏怖と恐怖に打たれ、できる限り素早く持ち場に戻るよう駆り立てられた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nach einigen Stunden Wache kehrt {petname} zurück. Du kennst die Route des Cyber-Mastiff mittlerweile – er hat einen Rundgang auf der Brücke und den oberen Decks gemacht und die verschiedenen Stationen inspiziert. Er ist halb Tier, halb Maschine und verkörpert die Hingabe zu den Idealen des Imperiums und dem unbeugsamen Willen seiner treuesten Diener. Sein Anblick sorgt bei untätigen Offizieren für Ehrfurcht und Angst, sodass sie so schnell wie möglich zu ihren Pflichten zurückkehren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} returns after a couple of watch hours. The cyber-mastiff's route is familiar to you by now — you know it has done a circle around the bridge and the upper decks, inspecting the various stations. Half beast, half machine, it is an embodiment of devotion to the ideals of the Imperium and the unbending will of its most faithful servants. The sight of it strikes awe and terror into any idling officers, compelling them to return to their duties as quickly as possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einigen Stunden Wache kehrt {petname} zurück. Du kennst die Route des Cyber-Mastiff mittlerweile – er hat einen Rundgang auf der Brücke und den oberen Decks gemacht und die verschiedenen Stationen inspiziert. Er ist halb Tier, halb Maschine und verkörpert die Hingabe zu den Idealen des Imperiums und dem unbeugsamen Willen seiner treuesten Diener. Sein Anblick sorgt bei untätigen Offizieren für Ehrfurcht und Angst, sodass sie so schnell wie möglich zu ihren Pflichten zurückkehren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} revient après quelques heures de quart. Désormais, vous connaissez parfaitement l'itinéraire du cyber-mastiff : vous savez qu'il a effectué une ronde sur la passerelle et les ponts supérieurs, prenant le temps d'inspecter chaque station. Mi-bête, mi-machine, il incarne à la perfection la dévotion aux idéaux de l'Imperium et la volonté inébranlable de ses plus fidèles serviteurs. Sa simple vue sème la panique dans le cœur de n'importe quel officier paresseux, l'incitant à redoubler d'efforts pour accomplir sa tâche.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} returns after a couple of watch hours. The cyber-mastiff's route is familiar to you by now — you know it has done a circle around the bridge and the upper decks, inspecting the various stations. The sight of it strikes awe and terror into any idling officers, compelling them to return to their duties as quickly as possible.{/n}

Mi-bête, mi-machine, il incarne à la perfection la dévotion aux idéaux de l'Imperium et la volonté inébranlable de ses plus fidèles serviteurs. Sa simple vue sème la panique dans le cœur de n'importe quel officier paresseux, l'incitant à redoubler d'efforts pour accomplir sa tâche.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} vuelve al cabo de unas pocas horas de guardia. A estas alturas ya conoces de sobra su ruta; sabes que ha dado una vuelta alrededor del puente y por las cubiertas superiores, inspeccionando los diversos puestos. El animal, mitad bestia y mitad máquina, encarna la devoción por los ideales del Imperium y la indómita voluntad de sus más fieles siervos. Su presencia infunde respeto y temor en los oficiales indolentes, que nada más verlo se apresuran a retomar sus obligaciones lo antes posible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} returns after a couple of watch hours. The cyber-mastiff's route is familiar to you by now — you know it has done a circle around the bridge and the upper decks, inspecting the various stations. languages.text: {n}几个小时之后，{petname}回来了。你很清楚这只生化獒犬的巡逻路线，你知道，它绕着舰桥与上层甲板转了一圈，检查了许多舱室。这只生化獒犬半是凶犬，半是机械，象征着对帝国无上的忠诚，体现着所有帝皇忠仆不屈不挠的意志。只要它出现，所有闲散的军官心里都会充满敬畏与恐惧，尽快重新回到自己的岗位上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} returns after a couple of watch hours. The sight of it strikes awe and terror into any idling officers, compelling them to return to their duties as quickly as possible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} birkaç saatin ardından dönüyor. Siber mastifin rotasına artık aşinasın. Köprü ve üst güvertelerde bir tur attığını ve çeşitli istasyonları gözetlediğini biliyorsun. Yarı yaratık yarı makine olan bu köpek, İmparatorluk'un ideallerinin ve en sadık hizmetkârlarının iradelerinin vücut bulmuş hâli. Bir bakışı bile aylaklık eden subayların içine korku salmaya ve görevlerini tez vakitte bitirmeleri için onları şevk etmeye yetiyor.{/n}
